articles.author: Fox News Staff
articles.title: Hunter Biden’s involvement in Ireland trip is a 'sad part of our American history': Rep. James Comer - Fox News
articles.description: Rep. James Comer, R-Ky., discusses the involvement of Hunter Biden in the President's trip to Ireland amid investigations into the family's business dealings.
articles.content: Rep. James Comer, R-Ky., joined "Fox & Friends Weekend" on Saturday morning and commented on President Biden's trip to Ireland with his son, Hunter playing a role in the visit The House Oversight… [+2260 chars]
